title: Homemade Presents Sporkful: Where All The Chefs Are Grandmas
description:
Sporkful is a podcast that obsesses about food to learn more about people. This podcast isn't for foodies, it's for eaters. not for foodies, it's for eaters. On this episode of The Sporkful, host Dan Pashman visits Enoteca Maria, where all the chefs were all Italian grandmas, or nonnas. The place provides its own kind of therapy for everyone.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
